mapper.select: SELECT a.IP_ADDRESS, b.SEVERITY, b.FACILITY, c.LOG_ID, c.UNION_KEY, c.UPDATE_TIME AS `TIMESTAMP`, c.MESSAGE, c.TAG, c.EVENT_COUNT AS `mergeCount` FROM sop_asset a LEFT JOIN sop_log_analysis_rule_rela b ON a.ASSET_ID = b.ASSET_ID LEFT JOIN sop_asset_merge_log c ON b.RULE_RELA_ID = c.RULE_RELA_ID WHERE a.ASSET_STATUS = 2 AND a.DELETE_STATE = 0 AND b.DELETE_STATE = 0 AND a.ASSET_ID = #{assetId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.IP_ADDRESS, b.SEVERITY, b.FACILITY, c.LOG_ID, c.UNION_KEY, c.UPDATE_TIME AS `TIMESTAMP`, c.MESSAGE, c.TAG, c.EVENT_COUNT AS `mergeCount` FROM sop_asset a LEFT JOIN sop_log_analysis_rule_rela b ON a.ASSET_ID = b.ASSET_ID LEFT JOIN sop_asset_merge_log c ON b.RULE_RELA_ID = c.RULE_RELA_ID WHERE a.ASSET_STATUS = 2 AND a.DELETE_STATE = 0 AND b.DELETE_STATE = 0 AND c.RULE_RELA_ID = #{ruleRelaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
